title: Vanilla Forums ImportController index file_exists Unserialize Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

profile.name: Vanilla
profile.about: Vanilla is a powerfully simple discussion forum you can easily customize to make as unique as your community.

activities.message:
Hi there. Your report has been assigned to a developer who  will provide a feedback shortly.
Thank you.

This has been triaged.
Thank you.
Shipped in 2.6.2, 2.5.5, upcoming 2.7, and previously to cloud.
Can we please disclose this case?

summaries.content: An authenticated admin user can inject an serialized payload into a phar archive and trigger a read access to it via an unprotected file_exists(). An attacker can leverage this to deserialize untrusted data and gain remote code execution.
